ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content##^\d+\.}}･{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.replaceRegex:
##.本章完.|【.*分享.*运营.*】|第.*章.*|.*第.*章.*|.*69吧书69新
@js:result
	.replace(/模擬/g,'模拟')
	.replace(/泡麵/g,'泡面')
	.replace(/伱/g,'你')
	.replace(/歷史/g,'历史')
	.replace(/着名/g,'著名')
	.replace(/名着/g,'名著')
	.replace(/着作/g,'著作')
	.replace(/先進/g,'先进')
	.replace(/状態/g,'状态')
	.replace(/號/g,'号')
	.replace(/縈/g,'萦')
	.replace(/[『「]/g,'“')
	.replace(/[』」]/g,'”')
	.replace(/。.*[❻６➅𝟨6Ϭ𝟔𝟼𝟞₆].*[９❾➈𝟫9(9s)९𝟡𝟿𝟗₉].*」/g,'。”')
	.replace(/。.*[❻６➅𝟨6Ϭ𝟔𝟼𝟞₆].*[９❾➈𝟫9(9s)९𝟡𝟿𝟗₉].*/g,'。')
		.replace(/新.*[❻６⑥➅𝟨6Ϭ𝟔𝟼𝟞₆].*[９❾⑨➈𝟫9(9s)९𝟡𝟿𝟗₉].*书吧.*/g,'')

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "🔒":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, " "),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "🔒":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, " "),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
java.put("intro",intro);
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1';
num=!type?'第{{$.chapterid}}章 ':'';
if(title.match(/[一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+\s*章|^\d+[、\.\s]|chapter\s*\d+/i)){
num=''
}else{num=num}
l=lock?'[锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;

//不显示卷名
result=!type?result:'';
</js>

n=result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/)[1];
var list=[];
for(let i=1;i<=n;i++){
list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl.replace(/page(?:%3D|=)\d+/g,'&page='+i+",{'webView':true}")});
}
}else{
var list=[{k:'第1页',v:baseUrl+",{'webView':true}"}];
}
list
</js>

<js>
//请不要改书源的任何地方，请点击“登录”后再填写

function getToast(){
	java.toast("用来看的，别点了，确认请点右上角的✓")
	};
	
function login(){
	Map = source.getLoginInfoMap();
	Map == (Map == null||Map=="")?{}:Map
	let token = Map.get("登录请在这里填写app的token");
	token = (token==""||token==null)?"":token;
	java.log(token);
	
	let fl = Map.get("填写需要开启的分类序号（如2,4,5【默认为9,10】）");
	fl = (fl==""||fl==null)?"9,10":fl;
	java.log(fl);
	
	let bq = Map.get("填写需要开启的分类序号（如2【默认为5，只能单选】）");
	bq = (bq==""||bq==null)?"5":bq;
	 
	 option = {
	 	"token":String(token),
	 	"fl":String(fl),
	 	"bq":String(bq)
	 	}
	source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(option))
	
	}
</js>

function decode(){ let v43,v38,dest; let respose = java.get(baseUrl,{"User-Agent": "Dalvik/2.1.0"}); let accesskey = String(respose.header("accesskey")); let keyString = String(respose.header("keystring")); let content = String(respose.body()); let accesskeyLen = accesskey.length; let v9 =0; let v6 = String(accesskey[accesskeyLen-1]).charCodeAt(); for(i=0;i v18){ v43 = keyString.substring(v15,(v18-v15)+v15) }else{ v43 = keyString.substring(v15,v17+v15) } let v32 = content.length; if((v6 & 1)!=0){ v38 = content.substring(v32-12,v32) dest = content.substring(0,v32-12) }else{ v38 = content.substring(0,12); dest = content.substring(12,content.length); } let key = java.md5Encode(v43+v38).substring(0,8); let iv = java.md5Encode(v38).substring(0,8); content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String(key), String(iv)).decryptStr(dest); return content } if(/jjwxc/.test(baseUrl)){ intro=String(java.get("intro1")).replace(/\s/g,''); /"content"/.test(result)?java.setContent(result):java.setContent(decode()); intro=intro!=""?"◎"+intro+"◎
":""; content=java.getString("$..content"); saybody=java.getString("$..sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n【📢作者有话说】\n"+saybody:""; if(/token/.test(baseUrl)){ vipc=String(content).length > 30?java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String("KW8Dvm2N"), String("1ae2c94b")).decryptStr(content):java.getString("$..message")+"\n登录后请更新目录，刷新正文"; result=intro+String(vipc+say); }else{ result=intro+content+say } }else{ result="" } //评论开启 let bbb = book.getVariable("custom") let sss=source.getVariable() if(/评论/.test(bbb) || /评论/.test(sss)){ let commentNum =/评论/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]:sss.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]; if(/chapterContent/.test(baseUrl)){ commentUrl = baseUrl.replace(/androidapi/,'comment').replace(/chapterContent/,'getCommentList')+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0"; }else if(/androidChapterBatchDownload/.test(baseUrl)){ body = baseUrl.match(/body":"(.*?)"/)[1]; commentUrl = "https://app.jjwxc.org/comment/getCommentList?"+body+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0&commentSort=0" } comment = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)); cflag = comment.code == "200" ? true:false; ccflag = comment.code == undefined ? true:false commentList = []; if(cflag || ccflag){ commentList =comment.commentList || comment.data.commentList ||[]; commentb = ""; }else{ commentb = comment.message } for(i=0;i ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+|◎\s+?◎

<js>
$=result;title=$.chaptername;title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');intro=$.chapterintro;vip=$.isvip!='0';lock=$.islock!='0';type=$.chaptertype=='1'?true:false;num=!type?$.chapterid+"  ☪ ":'';

bbb = book.getVariable("custom");sss = source.getVariable();
if(/去章节序号/.test(bbb) || /去章节序号/.test(sss)){
num=''
}
if(/章节名/.test(bbb) || /章节名/.test(sss)){
num=!type?"第"+$.chapterid+"章 ":'';
}
title=type?'📖 '+title+' 📖':title;
if( (/目录简介/.test(bbb) || /目录简介/.test(sss))&&!/📖/.test(title)){
	fu = /目录简介【(.*?)】/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/目录简介【(.*?)】/)[1]:sss.match(/目录简介【(.*?)】/)[1]
	title = title +fu+intro
	}else{
		java.put("intro1",intro);
		}
l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;
</js>

variableComment:
1、书籍变量（当前书）
填写 [去章节序号] —— 去除章节序号
填写[章节名]  ——  变为第xx章 章节名

填写 [目录简介【符号】] —— 章节简介放到目录列表，正文不出现 符号：跟章节名连接时中间的符号，如 目录简介【 】，中间将为空格

填写 [评论+评论数量]——如 评论50  则可以显示50条评论，数量必填

填写 [开启购买/关闭购买]  —— 如 开启购买 则会开启自动购买下五章【确认以后点右上角三点刷新才会生效，使用完毕后最好删除，避免重复请求】

2、源变量（所有书）
同书籍变量

}

ruleBookInfo.author: h2.0@text
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
u='■';nu='□'
m=baseUrl.split('/')
s=[1,{id:m[6],name:m[4],host:m[4],url:baseUrl}]
o=java.getElement('#chapterlist@div[style].0@a')
x=book.getVariable("custom")
for(i in o){
	m=o[i].attr('href').split('/')
	s.push({id:m[4],name:o[i].text(),host:m[2],url:source.key+o[i].attr('href')})
}
if(x!=''){n=Number(x);r=s[n];if(r.id){s[0]=n;java.toast('切换到源"'+r.host+'"');result=java.ajax(r.url);java.setContent(result)}else{java.toast('没有编号为"'+x+'"的源')}}
info=''
for(i=1;i<s.length;i++){
	info+=(s[0]==i?u:nu)+i+'：'+s[i].name+'\n'
}
java.put('info',info)
s=s[s[0]]
java.put('bookid',s.id)
java.put('source',s.host)
toc=result.match(/url\s*=\s*'(.+?)'/)[1]
tocData=java.get(source.key+toc,{referer:String(s.url)}).body()
if(!tocData||tocData==''){
	java.toast('目录被吃掉了！！')
}else{
	tocData=JSON.parse(tocData)
 tocData=tocData.oridata||tocData.data
 tocData=tocData.split('-//-').map(v=>{v=v.split('-/-');return {i:v[0],cid:v[1],title:v[2],vip:v[3]}})
 if(s.host=='uukanshu')tocData.reverse()
 java.put('last',tocData[tocData.length-1].title)
 java.put('toc',toc)
 java.put('tocData',JSON.stringify(tocData))
}
result
</js>.container
ruleBookInfo.intro: @get:{info} 🛠 在书籍变量中输入编号刷新即可换源 {{@@#book-sumary@html}}

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
[property="og:novel:lastest_chapter_name"]@content&&[property="og:novel:update_time"]@content##\n20(.*)\s.*## · $1
<js>result.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')</js>
<js>
result.replace(/^(\d+)、第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+\s/,'$1 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)(、|. ?)/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)*/,'$1 $2$3')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
.replace(/第0+/,'第')
.replace(/(第\d+章)\s\d+(.*)/,'$1$2')
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: class.book-rand-a@a@textNodes
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
'　　🔖最近更新：'
+result.match(/最新章节 ([^\n]+)/)[1]
+'\n　　🔖更新时间：'
+result.match(/更新时间 ([^\n]+)/)[1]
+'\n‎\n'
+result.match(/textarea hidden>([\W\w]+?)<\/texta/)[1].replace(/</g,'<').replace(/>/g,'>').replace(/'/g,"'")
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: class.book-title@tag.h2.0@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "💰":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, " "),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

.replace("••","")

.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";

	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent

function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>

	java.toast("地址变动，重新搜索加载！")
	result=java.ajax(baseUrl+`,{

	}else{result=result}
	result;

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
	var data = JSON.parse( result ).data;
	var pageSize = data.comments.length;
	var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; 
	var list = [];

	for(var i = 0; i < pageCount; i++){
 	 var index = i+1;
    var tt = '第' + index +'页 ' + java.get("s")+'分 ' + java.get("sc") +'人 '+java.get("ut");
  list[i] = {
  	title: String(tt).replace(/页 (\d)(\d)/, '页 $1.$2' ).replace(/\.\d+?人/, '人' ).replace(/T.+/, '' ), 
		url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=latest&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}

list;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: h2.0@text
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
u='■';nu='□'
m=baseUrl.split('/')
s=[1,{id:m[6],name:m[4],host:m[4],url:baseUrl}]
o=java.getElement('#chapterlist@div[style].0@a')
x=book.getVariable("custom")
for(i in o){
	m=o[i].attr('href').split('/')
	s.push({id:m[4],name:o[i].text(),host:m[2],url:source.key+o[i].attr('href')})
}
if(x!=''){n=Number(x);r=s[n];if(r.id){s[0]=n;java.toast('切换到源"'+r.host+'"');result=java.ajax(r.url);java.setContent(result)}else{java.toast('没有编号为"'+x+'"的源')}}
time=java.getString('meta[property=og:novel:update_time]@content')
java.put('time',time)
info=''
for(i=1;i<s.length;i++){
	info+=(s[0]==i?u:nu)+i+'：'+s[i].name+'\n'
}
pay=result.match(/" vip"/)
pay&&java.put('pay',pay[0])
java.put('info',info)
s=s[s[0]]
java.put('bookid',s.id)
java.put('source',s.host)
toc=source.key+result.match(/url\s*=\s*'(.+?)'/)[1]+',{"headers":{"referer":"'+s.url+'"}}'
java.put('toc',toc)
cache.delete(toc)
tocData=getTocData()
if(!tocData){
	java.toast('目录被吃掉了！！')
}else{
	java.put('last',tocData[tocData.length-1].title+'·'+time)
}
result
</js>.container

.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>
h = String(source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1]);
q = "?q=" + encodeURIComponent(java.get('key'));

c = "Hm_lvt_="+~~(new Date().getTime()/1e3);

head = {
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: String(h+"s"+q),
	cookie: String(c)
}

hm = ";hm="+java.head(h+"/user/hm.html"+q, head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

Get = java.get(h+"/user/search.html"+q, head);
JSON.parse(Get.body())
.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')

.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')

.replace(/\[|。/,'')

<js>
var sk=java.get("sk");
var su=source.getKey();
var v=source.getVariable();
var so=/s.php/.test(baseUrl);
if(so){
	var bu=baseUrl.match(/^(.+)\/s.php/)[1];
if(bu!=su&&bu!=v){
	source.setVariable(bu);
	java.toast("地址变动，重新搜索加载！")
	result=java.ajax(baseUrl+`,{
		"body": "s=${String(sk)}",
		"method": "POST"}`);
		}
	}else{result=result}
	result;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("1701019k").getBytes(),"DES");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AQIDBAUGBwg="));
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
String(decrypt(JSON.parse(result).DATA.CTXT)).replace(/{{title}}/,'')
</js>

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
source_url="https://novel-api.xiaoppkk.com/cdn/book/source/{{$.id}}.html";
result=java.ajax(source_url);
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
data=JSON.parse(result).result.list;

v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
var v=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:0;
v=parseInt(v)<data.length?v:0;

con="\n使用说明：(根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0))\n❗当前来源：序号【"+v+"】："+data[v].name;

for(var i=0;i<data.length;i++){
   con+="\n❤序号【"+i+"】："+data[i].name;
   con+="\n书籍ID："+data[i].internal_book_id;
   con+="\n源ID："+data[i].source_id;	
		con+="\n源选择率："+data[i].show_text;
		con+="\n源地址："+data[i].chapter_list_url;
		con+="\n更新："+data[i].new_title;
			
}


 try{ book_id=data[v].internal_book_id; }
 catch(e) { book_id = java.getString('$.id');}
 
 if(v==0&&book_id==0){ 
 	book_id = java.getString('$.id');
 	tocUrl="/cdn/book/chapterList/"+java.put('book_id',book_id)+".html";
 }
else if(v!=0&&book_id==0) {
	 tUrl=data[v].chapter_list_url;
	 tocUrl=tUrl+"," + JSON.stringify({"headers":{"Referer": tUrl}});
	}
else if(book_id!=0){ 
		tocUrl="/cdn/book/chapterList/"+java.put('book_id',book_id)+".html";
	}

java.put('tocUrl',tocUrl); 
intro = " "+java.getString('$.description')+con;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/cdn\/book\/content/)){
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
content = java.getString('$.result.info.content');
}
else{
	content = java.getElement("#content");
	}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/cdn\/book\/chapterList/)){
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
data = JSON.parse(result).result.list;
length = data.length;
chapterList = [];
for(var i = 0; i < length; i ++){
	name = "🏮〖"+data[i].name+"〗🏮";
	chapterList.push({
			text: name,
			href: null,
			volume: true
	})	
	data[i].list.forEach(($) => {						
		text = $.name;
		id = $.id;
    href = "/cdn/book/content/{{java.get('book_id')}}/"+id+".html";   
    chapterList.push({
			text: text,
			href: href	
	})
	})	
	}
chapterList
}
else{
	chapterList = [];
	datas = java.getElement("dd@a").toArray();
	//java.log(JSON.stringify(chapterList));
	for (var i = 0; i < datas.length; i++) {
    text = datas[i].text();
			hre = baseUrl.split(',')[0]+datas[i].attr("href");
			d=String(hre).split('\/');
list=[];
d.forEach((s, index)=>{ 
	 if (list.indexOf(s) == -1) {
 	   list.push(s);      }
		
		});
		href = list.toString().replace(/,/g,"/");
						
     chapterList.push({
		 	 text: text,
		  	 href: href	
      	})            
   };
	chapterList
	}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
uri = String(uri)
    .replace('chapterList', 'content')
    .replace('.html', '/');
_ = {
    result: {
        list: []
    }
};
push = __ => _.result.list.push(__);
$.list.map($ => {
    if ($.name) {
        push({
            name: $.name,
            volume: true
        });
    }
    $.list.map($ => {
        if ($.has_content == 1) {
            url = java.base64Encode(uri + $.id + '.html');
            $.url = `data:;base64,${url},{"type":"${type}"}`;
            return push($);
        }
    })
})
JSON.stringify(_);
</js>$.result.list[*]

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
source_url = baseUrl.replace('/004?','/005?');
data = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data;

con  = data.map($=>{
	  // year = $.year;
l =	$.data.map(($,i)=>{	
		intro =  '【'+$.qishu+'】';
		url =  baseUrl.replace(/qishu=.*&bkId/,"qishu="+$.qishu+ "&bkId"); 				
return	 JSON.stringify({"intro":intro,"url":url});
	});
return l
	}).join(',');
	$ = JSON.parse(JSON.parse(JSON.stringify("["+con+"]")));

n = 0;
v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:n;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:n;
url = $[x].url;

result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data;

if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换期刊(默认0)\n🎯当前期刊：序号🔺'+x+'🔻'+$[x].intro+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻'+$[i].intro;
	}
result.tocUrl = $[x].url;
result.remark = y;
}

result = JSON.stringify(result);

}
catch(e){
	result = JSON.parse(result).data;
	result.tocUrl = baseUrl;
	result = JSON.stringify(result);
}
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
